entries.title_d: The Rori Station's new supplier of repair droids has doubts about your ability to help keep future shipments safe. Prove yourself by defeating a squad of Imperial fighters in combat.
entries.title: Naboo system: Hunt Imperial fighters.
entries.quest_location_d: The Naboo System is full of dangerous elements. Defeat a squad of Imperial fighters.
entries.quest_escort_t: Destroy the entire squad of Imperial fighters.
entries.quest_escort_d: Destroy all ships in the squadron of Imperial fighters. Make sure none escape.
entries.failed_escape: You let them escape! Return to the station for further instructions. Hopefully, we'll try again.
entries.destroy_escort: The entire squad must be eradicated.
entries.assassinate_success: Good work, pilot. That proves you can handle Imperial fighters.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Nav location to the target squad has been located. Proceed with extreme prejudice.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for a squadron of Imperial fighters. Stand by to proceed with the attack.
